translation: Yylhi Allah tʿālyā sund mdd th ftḥ vathi.
Th tohụ̄ vuchhvukh lukh (zi) tim chih Allah tʿālyā sndis dyins mnz khyjv khyjv dạkhl spdan.
Tylhi kriv tohụ̄ (shkranh rngụ̄) pnnis rb snz ḥmd san tsbyḥ th (khạṭrdạry rngụ̄) kriv ts nishhi astghfar, be shk chuh suh sytthhe tvbh qbvl krn vvl (byyhi chuh mzyd rḥmt san tvjh krn vvl).
